trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: When you create an ObjectListCommandEventHandler delegate for an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的一个 ObjectListCommandEventHandler 委托<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>需要标识将处理该事件的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>生成项事件时通知该处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。
